channel.title: [PI] Crossbow Bug
channel.description:
When ever I attack an npc with a crossbow such as rune or an armadyl crossbow, sometimes it doesn't cause any damage towards the npc. I'm pretty sure it has to do with the bolt special because it never hits and it randomly doesn't hit like it doesn't do damage for 1 hit then the next hit it doesn't, it's a random pattern. How can i fix this issue?
[img]http://i.gyazo.com/6a84f417710e69bca8bbe0b5d80d9373.gif[/img]
Error I get: [code][7/19/14 8:46 PM]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 332 [7/19/14 8:46 PM]: at server.model.players.combat.range.RangeExtras.crossbowSpecial(RangeExtras.java:48) [7/19/14 8:46 PM]: at server.model.players.CombatAssistant.crossbowSpecial(CombatAssistant.java:291) [7/19/14 8:46 PM]: at server.model.players.combat.AttackNPC.delayedHit(AttackNPC.java:193) [7/19/14 8:46 PM]: at server.model.players.CombatAssistant.delayedHit(CombatAssistant.java:103) [7/19/14 8:46 PM]: at server.model.players.Client.process(Client.java:675) [7/19/14 8:46 PM]: at server.model.players.PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:151) [7/19/14 8:46 PM]: at server.Server$1.execute(Server.java:221) [7/19/14 8:46 PM]: at server.event.Task.tick(Task.java:118) [7/19/14 8:46 PM]: at server.event.TaskScheduler.run(TaskScheduler.java:103) [7/19/14 8:46 PM]: at java.util.concurrent.Executors$RunnableAdapter.call(Unknown Source) [7/19/14 8:46 PM]: at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask$Sync.innerRunAndReset(Unknown Source) [7/19/14 8:46 PM]: at java.util.concurrent.FutureTask.runAndReset(Unknown Source) [7/19/14 8:46 PM]: at java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask.access$301(Unknown Source) [7/19/14 8:46 PM]: at java.util.concurrent.ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor$ScheduledFutureTask.run(Unknown Source) [7/19/14 8:46 PM]: at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor.runWorker(Unknown Source) [7/19/14 8:46 PM]: at java.util.concurrent.ThreadPoolExecutor$Worker.run(Unknown Source) [7/19/14 8:46 PM]: at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
If you need the lines provided in the error, I will provide em.

item.title: [PI] Crossbow Bug
item.dc:creator: @joeyscape joeyscape
item.description:
@joeyscape wrote:

Camballer:

332 is too large of a value. What is line 48 in RangeExtras?

item.title: [PI] Crossbow Bug
item.dc:creator: @joeyscape joeyscape
item.description:
@joeyscape wrote:

When ever I attack an npc with a crossbow such as rune or an armadyl crossbow, sometimes it doesn’t cause any damage towards the npc. I’m pretty sure it has to do with the bolt special because it never hits and it randomly doesn’t hit like it doesn’t do damage for 1 hit then the next hit it doesn’t, it’s a random pattern. How can i fix this issue?
